Very comfortable pair of pants. I tried them in and the fit was on point, very easy to move around in and not to thick or thin. Most of the pants I buy now are either too short or incorrectly sized. These pants are an exact fit to size. Could have had more length, but for the most part it’s suitable. I haven’t worn them out yet, but I will be soon. I’ll be back with an update one I wear them for the day.

These sweatpants are cute. I purchased them hoping they would look like the picture. They did not on me. I am 5”7 so maybe the pants did not fit on me as it would someone that is shorter. I don’t know whether to say, go ahead and buy them or not, but I don’t feel they were a waste of my money. They just did not meet my expectation based off of the picture. I will continue to wear them because they are comfy. I just think the versatility of dressing it up and dressing it down isn’t there. The material is stretchy and there is a drawstring with an elastic waistband.
